_phrases.cloud_saving:
Syncing...
Your progress is being synced to the cloud to enable you to resume your learning later.
_phrases.cloud_success:
Sync successful
Your progress has been saved to the cloud. You can safely close this window.
_phrases.cloud_failed:
Sync failed
Your progress is being saved locally only. You can continue to learn. To sync your progress, simply reconnect to the internet before closing this window.
